pr_title: gherkin/javascript: Throw NoSuchLanguageException when language is unknown

timeline.message:
gherkin/javascript: Throw NoSuchLanguageException when language is uknown

Fixes: #808

timeline.bodyText: @vincent-psarga I flipped the argument order of this method. But I can't really judge of that would be a breaking change or not. I don't think this class is intended to be used by the public?
timeline.author: mpkorstanje
